LINDA DIAZ possesses a beautiful voice, sonorous in the low notes, sweet, in the iniddle register, powerfnl and of great extension in the high notes, she commands lier voice masterly, lier modulation and vocalization is perfect, with admirable affination that impresses the audience. VVhere she sliowed lier great merits was in the « Aria of Aida, » better execution is impossible; the « Diva » sang with great vigour and courage the phrase « Vincitor del padrp mio » showing, in the rest of this beautiful page of the great work of Verdi, that she is one of the first dramatic singers. J-tA PRESSE Liverpool Courrier LINDA DIAZ is a great artiste, lier voice is warm and vibrant, lier method perfect, and lier play as tragédienne in the great rôles of «Aida, » « Norma, » « Lucrezia, » « Gioconda » and « Yalentine, » have secured lier great triumphs, and lier extraordinary talent brings to our minci the celebrated « Malibran. » L'Etoile Belge de Bruxelles LINDA DIAZ est une cantatrice do grand lalent, douée d’un instrument superbe; les notes graves sont d’une sonorité rare, et le registe élevé atteint à une très grande puissance, sans jamais être dur.
